mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%u') as week, AVG(temperature) as temperature, AVG(humidity) as humidity, AVG(co2) as co2, AVG(ammonia) as ammonia, AVG(pm) as pm FROM farm_env_info WHERE farm_idx = #{farm_idx} GROUP BY week
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO farm_info (farm_name, farm_loc, farm_livestock_cnt, mem_id) VALUES (#{farm_name}, #{farm_loc}, #{farm_livestock_cnt}, #{mem_id})
